title: The new client doesn't work after i'm done patching.
body: I suddenly had to restart League, but then i tried to log in again, but after i clicked "launch" nothing comes up. So i re-installed the game over and over, and tried, but still not working. Anyone knows why?

replies.body: This can happen if your security settings are not allowing the patcher to launch.  The steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide should fix you up!
